Step 1 : Start a Transaction > Personal information modal shows up Step 2 : Enter First Name Click Next on keyboard > Control goes to middle name Step 3 : Enter Middle Name and Click Next on keyboard > control goes to last name Step 4: Enter Last Name and Click Next on keyboard > Nothing happens
Issue 1 : Fix the navigation and UI (IMG_7180) Note: Expect Go to next
Step 5: Enter the Day of Birth. After making a selection how do I say / click Done
Issue 2 : The Done link is hidden as it is in white color font and is not visible Note: ??
Step 6 : Go to Month and select a month
Step 7 : Go to Year Drop down and select a year
Issue 3 : The UI is distorted and looks ugly and the Done button is still not visible (IMG_7181) Note: cannot re-product in ipad ,select
Issue 4 : After selecting the year the UI is still very much distorted (screenshot) (IMG_7182) Note: select
Step 8: Go to State Drop Down Issue 5: California is selected by default (Why is that so?) Note: default
Step 9: By mistake I entered a wrong address (Address 1 : 777 3rd Avenue , Address 2 : Empty , State : NJ ,Zip:07302) Issue 6 : Distorted UI (screenshot) (IMG_7184) Note: SmartStreet issue 7 : Text control goes to first name (if the address was validated then the control needs to go there) Note: focus
Step 10: Entered correct address > Address format standardized window shows up Issue 8 : Distorted UI (IMG_7185) Note: SmartStreet
Step 11: Personal window shows up with modified address Issue 9 : If I clicked OK on accepting the modified address why am I being brought to the original screen?
Note: SmartStreet
Step 12: Save the new address Issue 10 : I have been signed out (IMG_7186) (This is so frustrating. As an end user I would never come back to this app) Note: session

你们的问题 有一个关于新的css 你们从app中拆分出一个单独的login.css 用来login 之前的这些页面
但是他需要引用 application.css: 90% is not used by the current page. foundation-icons.css: 99% is not used by the current page. foundation.min.css: 88% is not used by the current page. login.css: 72% is not used by the current page. normalize.css: 64% is not used by the current page.
如果加载这么多的css 会影响性能
我们有一个Solution 关于拆分css 我们为拆分出来一个单独的页面为login.
其他页面用application.
这样的话，login页面的加载速度就会非常快
附件是我们的拆分出来的Login.css和其他页面使用的application.
Merge: toggle.min.js

$('input[type="date"], input[type="datetime"], input[type="datetime-local"], input[type="month"], input[type="time"], input[type="week"]').each(function() { var el = this, type = $(el).attr('type'); if ($(el).val() == '') $(el).attr('type', 'text'); $(el).focus(function() { $(el).attr('type', type); el.click(); }); $(el).blur(function() { if ($(el).val() == '') $(el).attr('type', 'text'); }); });
